english: Do you have any pain or pressure across the chest?
cantonese: Nei5 hung1 bou6 jau5 si4 wui3 m4 wui3 tung3 waak6 ze2 gok3 dak1 jau5 ngaat3 lik6?
characters: 你胸部有時會唔會痛或者覺得有壓力？

english:
Do you have shortness of breath?
On exertion
While resting
cantonese:
jau5 mou5 gok3 dak1 hei3 cuk1?
Jung6 lik6 ge3 si4 hau6
Jau1 sik1 ge3 si4 hau6
characters:
有冇覺得氣促?
用力嘅時候?
休息嘅時候?

english: How many blocks can you walk before becoming short of breath?
cantonese: Nei5 haang4 gwo3 gei2 tiu4 gaai1 wui5 hoi1 ci2 hei3 cuk1?
characters: 你行過幾條街會開始氣促？

english: Do you get shortness of breath while lying flat in bed?
cantonese: Fan3 dai1 jau5 mou5 gok3 dak1 hei3 cuk1?

english: How many pillows do you sleep on?
cantonese: Nei5 fan3 gei2 go3 zam2 tau4?

english: Do you sit up at night because of shortness of breath?
cantonese: Jau5 mou5 bun3 je6 seng2 zo2, hei3 cuk1, jiu3 co5 hei2 san1?
characters: 有冇半夜醒咗氣促，要坐起身？

english: Do your ankles ever swell up? Equally or is one more swollen than the other?
cantonese: Loeng5 zek3 goek3 ngaan5 jau5 mou5 zung2 gwo3? Jat1 joeng6 zung2, ding6 hai6 jat1 go3 zung2 di1?
characters: 兩隻腳眼有冇腫過？一樣腫，定係一個腫啲？

english: Have you ever had an EKG?
cantonese: Jau5 mou5 zou6 gwo3 sam1 din6 tou4?
